title: How to Get Free Starbucks Coupons

methods.name: Registering for the Starbucks Rewards Program

steps.headline: Download the Starbucks app on your phone.
steps.description: Go to the App Store or Google Play Store and type Starbucks in the search bar. Find the official Starbucks app and tap the download button. Once the app is downloaded, open it and tap the "Join Now" button. Fill in your personal information to complete the registration process and sign up for the program. Downloading the Starbucks app on your phone will allow you to pay for Starbucks products with your phone and will enter you into the rewards program without having to buy a gift card first.

steps.headline: Purchase a gift card if you don't want the app.
steps.description: You need a gift card or an e-gift card to create a Starbucks Rewards account if you don't want to download the app. Go to a physical Starbucks location and purchase a gift card for $5 or more. To buy an e-gift card, go to https://www.starbucks.com/ and click "Card" on the top navigation menu. Follow the prompts and fill out your personal information to purchase it. Once you get the card, hold onto it because you’ll need the card number to sign up for the rewards program. Your gift card will act as your Rewards card until your account hits gold status.

steps.headline: Sign up for the Starbucks Rewards Program.
steps.description: To become a member of the Starbucks Rewards Program, visit https://www.starbucks.com/account/create. Once there, fill out the form to create your account. You’ll need to enter the 16-digit card number and the security code on your Starbucks gift card to finish the registration. Fill in the rest of the fields for your name and email as well.

steps.headline: Add funds to your account.
steps.description: Once you sign up for the program, you can add additional funds to your card online. This will allow you to pay for Starbucks items through your phone or with your Starbucks Rewards card. Go to your account and tap the "Pay" button. From there, you'll want to hit the "Reload" button and add the funds from a credit card that you own.To reload the card on the website, go to https://www.starbucks.com/card and click the "Reload" button on the bottom the page. Follow the prompts to add funds to your account. You'll have to input card information if you've never reloaded your card before.

steps.headline: Get a free drink on your birthday.
steps.description: Every person who signs up for the Starbucks Rewards Program will receive one free drink or food item on their birthday. To receive your free drink, you must enter your birthdate when you initially sign up for the rewards program. You can get any sized drink and almost any menu item as a part of this promotion. The offer will be loaded onto your phone two days before your birthday and will expire the day after your birthday. The free birthday drink excludes alcoholic beverages, whole bakery loaves, and multi-serve coffee presses.

steps.headline: Opt-into emails to receive special offers and promotions.
steps.description: Input an email address that you regularly use when registering for the rewards program so that you can receive occasional free promotions and coupons in your email. Common email rewards include discounted drinks, free beverages, and other Starbucks related coupons.

steps.headline: Gain two stars for every $1 you spend.
steps.description: For every dollar that you spend, you’ll gain two stars which can be used to attain gold membership status. Once you gain gold membership status, you’ll be eligible for even more free coupons and promotions.

steps.headline: Gain 300 stars in 12 months to become a gold member.
steps.description: Once you get gold membership status, the additional points you gain will go towards a free drink. You’ll also get a physical gold card sent to you in the mail.

steps.headline: Get a free drink for every 125 stars you gain.
steps.description: Once you’ve reached gold status, you’ll get a free drink for every 125 stars that you gain. Continue buying products from Starbucks to build up your points.

steps.headline: Purchase Starbucks grocery store products.
steps.description: Certain products that you purchase at the grocery store can add to your overall star total. Look for items tagged with the Starbucks logo. Once you purchase the product, enter the star code that can be found inside of the item’s packaging. To enter a star code, visit https://www.starbucks.com/card/rewards and input the number into the field on the website. Eligible Starbucks products include whole bean or ground coffee, Starbucks VIA, Instant Starbucks, K-Cups, and various ready-to-drink products.

steps.headline: Purchase more Starbucks items during double reward days.
steps.description: Once you become a gold member, there will be a random day each month when you can gain double the points for Starbucks products. This means that you gain 4 star points for every $1 spent on Starbucks items. Take advantage of these days and purchase more Starbucks products than you normally would so that you can gain more stars. You will receive an email notification when double star days happen.

steps.headline: Purchase discounted Starbucks gift cards.
steps.description: Sometimes third-party companies will offer a discounted Starbucks gift card. You can load the money from this discounted card onto your account to purchase Starbucks items. This essentially amounts to discounted Starbucks products. You can transfer the funds from your new gift card to your account by tapping "Pay" and then "Manage" with your phone. If you're using the website, login to your account and click "Manage," then go through the prompts to add your gift card.

steps.headline: Find discounted coupons on third party websites.
steps.description: Sites like Groupon, Coupons.com, and Hip 2 Save regularly run promotions that include discounted Starbucks coupons and Starbucks promotions. Search these sites for Starbucks specific deals. Other websites include She Saved, The Krazy Koupon Lady, Living Social, and Retailmenot.

steps.headline: Earn rewards with a Starbucks sponsored credit card.
steps.description: Certain credit card companies give credit cards that give you additional star points when you use them on entertainment or food purchases. If you buy a lot of Starbucks products, consider registering and using a credit card to gain extra points and free drinks. Credit cards that include Starbucks rewards include Chase Freedom, Citi ThankYou, and Chase Sapphire Preferred. Go to the credit card's website to apply for a credit card.

text: Registering for the Starbucks Rewards Program Download the Starbucks app on your phone. Go to the App Store or Google Play Store and type Starbucks in the search bar. Find the official Starbucks app and tap the download button. Once the app is downloaded, open it and tap the "Join Now" button. Fill in your personal information to complete the registration process and sign up for the program. Downloading the Starbucks app on your phone will allow you to pay for Starbucks products with your phone and will enter you into the rewards program without having to buy a gift card first. Purchase a gift card if you don't want the app. You need a gift card or an e-gift card to create a Starbucks Rewards account if you don't want to download the app. Go to a physical Starbucks location and purchase a gift card for $5 or more. To buy an e-gift card, go to https://www.starbucks.com/ and click "Card" on the top navigation menu. Follow the prompts and fill out your personal information to purchase it. Once you get the card, hold onto it because you’ll need the card number to sign up for the rewards program. Your gift card will act as your Rewards card until your account hits gold status. Sign up for the Starbucks Rewards Program. To become a member of the Starbucks Rewards Program, visit https://www.starbucks.com/account/create. Once there, fill out the form to create your account. You’ll need to enter the 16-digit card number and the security code on your Starbucks gift card to finish the registration. Fill in the rest of the fields for your name and email as well. Add funds to your account. Once you sign up for the program, you can add additional funds to your card online. This will allow you to pay for Starbucks items through your phone or with your Starbucks Rewards card. Go to your account and tap the "Pay" button. From there, you'll want to hit the "Reload" button and add the funds from a credit card that you own.To reload the card on the website, go to https://www.starbucks.com/card and click the "Reload" button on the bottom the page. Follow the prompts to add funds to your account. You'll have to input card information if you've never reloaded your card before. Using the Starbucks Rewards Program Get a free drink on your birthday. Every person who signs up for the Starbucks Rewards Program will receive one free drink or food item on their birthday. To receive your free drink, you must enter your birthdate when you initially sign up for the rewards program. You can get any sized drink and almost any menu item as a part of this promotion. The offer will be loaded onto your phone two days before your birthday and will expire the day after your birthday. The free birthday drink excludes alcoholic beverages, whole bakery loaves, and multi-serve coffee presses. Opt-into emails to receive special offers and promotions. Input an email address that you regularly use when registering for the rewards program so that you can receive occasional free promotions and coupons in your email. Common email rewards include discounted drinks, free beverages, and other Starbucks related coupons. Gain two stars for every $1 you spend. For every dollar that you spend, you’ll gain two stars which can be used to attain gold membership status. Once you gain gold membership status, you’ll be eligible for even more free coupons and promotions. Gain 300 stars in 12 months to become a gold member. Once you get gold membership status, the additional points you gain will go towards a free drink. You’ll also get a physical gold card sent to you in the mail. Get a free drink for every 125 stars you gain. Once you’ve reached gold status, you’ll get a free drink for every 125 stars that you gain. Continue buying products from Starbucks to build up your points. Purchase Starbucks grocery store products. Certain products that you purchase at the grocery store can add to your overall star total. Look for items tagged with the Starbucks logo. Once you purchase the product, enter the star code that can be found inside of the item’s packaging. To enter a star code, visit https://www.starbucks.com/card/rewards and input the number into the field on the website. Eligible Starbucks products include whole bean or ground coffee, Starbucks VIA, Instant Starbucks, K-Cups, and various ready-to-drink products. Purchase more Starbucks items during double reward days. Once you become a gold member, there will be a random day each month when you can gain double the points for Starbucks products. This means that you gain 4 star points for every $1 spent on Starbucks items. Take advantage of these days and purchase more Starbucks products than you normally would so that you can gain more stars. You will receive an email notification when double star days happen. Finding Third Party Promotions Purchase discounted Starbucks gift cards. Sometimes third-party companies will offer a discounted Starbucks gift card. You can load the money from this discounted card onto your account to purchase Starbucks items. This essentially amounts to discounted Starbucks products. You can transfer the funds from your new gift card to your account by tapping "Pay" and then "Manage" with your phone. If you're using the website, login to your account and click "Manage," then go through the prompts to add your gift card. Find discounted coupons on third party websites. Sites like Groupon, Coupons.com, and Hip 2 Save regularly run promotions that include discounted Starbucks coupons and Starbucks promotions. Search these sites for Starbucks specific deals. Other websites include She Saved, The Krazy Koupon Lady, Living Social, and Retailmenot. Earn rewards with a Starbucks sponsored credit card. Certain credit card companies give credit cards that give you additional star points when you use them on entertainment or food purchases. If you buy a lot of Starbucks products, consider registering and using a credit card to gain extra points and free drinks. Credit cards that include Starbucks rewards include Chase Freedom, Citi ThankYou, and Chase Sapphire Preferred. Go to the credit card's website to apply for a credit card.
